verbs.description: [V: suspected] [ARG1: abuser] called his victim from jail at least 16 times cops say i understand you ’re upset with me he said in a voicemail i ’m sorry i know you ’re upset with me and i apologize about what i did to you i ’ll make it up to you i apologize and i love you jeremy floyd
